sources.title: The Red Mill 1927 Colorized
sources.description: From IMDB: A tavern worker and the daughter of a burgomaster enter into elaborate masquerades in order to win the hearts of the men they love.https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0018311 Fun wacky silent comedy set in olde worlde Holland, starring Marion Davies. Colorized using DeOldify technology, Avidemux's Old Photo filter and VirtualDub 2's 6-Axis Color Corrector. No soundtrack. (Note: Although this movie is public domain, the colorization is copyright by me. My colorized movies are freely uploaded for free personal use. Please don't put them on your own YouTube channel and monetize them. Thanks.)
